name: Space Marine (hamzaalmawla)
description:
My 2D shooter game which is called '' Space Marine''

Modifications:

Added a new background for the main menu that I made, Re vamped the whole UI, added instructions in the main menu, added 2 new buttons for level 4 and 5

Added two new challenging levels with increased difficulty

Added a boss fight in the final level

Ps. If finish the game an ''End credit' will play
